signature: Predicate<T> allPredicate(Collection<? extends Predicate<? super T>>)

enhanced_by.reason: The validate method is used to ensure the predicates collection is valid before processing in allPredicate.
truePredicate is used to return a true predicate when the predicates collection is empty.
coerce is used to convert a single predicate when the predicates collection has only one element.
copy is used to create a copy of the predicates array before creating the AllPredicate instance.
